1.0.name: wordpress/social-articles
1.0.description:
This is the only BuddyPress plugin that let you to create posts from your profile. It supports all buddypres themes, so you don't need to be an expert to use it!

FEATURES

  • Administration area in your buddypress profile (access, create, edit and delete)
  • Status administration
  • Approval workflow
  • Direct publish workflow
  • wysiwyg html5 editor
  • Support for featured image
  • You can set categories and tags
  • BuddyPress notifications when a post is published (for you and your friends)
  • Your post will be listed in your buddyPress profile
  • Admin configuration (post per page, excerpt length, show buddyPress notifications)
  • Multiple or single category selection (whit admin settings)
  • Spanish and German (thanks @per4mance) translation
  • Buddypress 1.7 compatible

You can read more about features on the
